law.text: There is hereby created in state government the Kentucky Early Intervention System to provide services for infants and toddlers with a disability and their families. For administrative purposes, the Kentucky Early Intervention System shall be attached to the Cabinet for Health and Family Services.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 211, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 175, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 313, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1994.
